page.title: 09LAW & ORDER IN WGC.
page.content: Law and order in our block is under the overall jurisdiction of the Police Headquarters which controls the town centre police station and also the policeman on the beat.The force in Hertfordshire consists of {1600 } policeman,{300 }police cars and {22 } police dogs.The headquarters employ { {40-50 }policeman,the rest of the staff are civilians.The operations room controls emergency calls,even the lights on the {M1. }There are {10 }dog kennels,a firing range and facilities for policemen to learn driving skills. There were {20,000 }crimes committed in Hertfordshire in {1984. }The control room handles an average of {25 false calls every night.
